text:
New District Technologies | http://newdistrict.ca | ONSITE | Vancouver, BC, Canada

SEEKING â€” SENIOR DEVELOPER

New District is an agile technology company offering the next generation of e-commerce capabilities for wine producers. We bring the best craft BC wine to the rest of Canada.

Description: We are looking for a seasoned, motivated individual who will work with our CTO to plan, code, test, debug, configure, document, and deploy a number of tools for our platform, with an emphasis on operations & optimization. The candidate will have experience with more than a couple languages, and the ability to work with the latest technology to write efficient and scalable software.

For Requirements and Responsibilities please visit http://newdistrict.ca/careers

Responses may be directed to team@newdistrict.ca
